text: you people (some) are rude! he was just having fun!
author: crazyiproshow

text: Hey make all the darkcload music in vids unreversed and if u want reversed AS WELL
author: redwaller66

text: Thanks for your very polite reply, SupraDarky! I have nothing but respect for you, just keep doing your thang, it's much appreciated :)
author: CleverDjembe

text: And trust me, it's not an easy decision for me to do so, because I know some people won't appreciate it. However, I've always told myself that I'd keep uploading and doing what I felt was right, even with the pressure of thousands of subscribers. :) I'm glad you're honest at least and that you voiced your opinion.
author: SupraDarky

text: I know some people probably hate reversed music, and I'd agree that most of the time it sounds completely awful. There is however nothing wrong at all to put some cool findings from time to time (that's only the 2nd time!), especially when it's not included in the Best VGM series. ;) It's a bit like when I feel like uploading movie soundtracks, etc. Hopefully people can ignore those uploads if they don't like them!
author: SupraDarky

text: Dark Cloud music is amazing. Yet played backwards makes it that even more so.
author: Staringathesun

text: And I didn't mean to sound too serious; this version is actually listenable, but it's an exception. Besides, I know you're only having fun, so just take my comment for what it's worth.
author: CleverDjembe

text: Please, no more of this crap. Reversing a piece of completed music is an obscure electronica experiment that anybody is free to try with an audio editor, but it's not musically interesting to most people and shouldn't be included in a channel which celebrates good, "traditional" music.
author: CleverDjembe

text: Thanks, you're right! Weird typo on my file.
author: SupraDarky

text: Never played the game but I always like your picks so gave it a listen.  I like the reversed version a lot more, would be interesting if one of yours originals also work in reversed mode.
author: bashildy

text: Haha indeed, which explains the reversed artwork as well!
author: SupraDarky

text: People in the village are walking backwards, and the windmill is rotating in the opposite direction...
author: Sephiko

text: This is usually what a reversed cymbal (or open hi-hat) sounds like. In this case, it's more like a reversed tambourine!
author: SupraDarky

text: BTW, for anyone who missed the first one, it was Pokemon's Lavender Town. :P
author: SupraDarky

text: Second reversed song! I actually reversed this one by mistake when I made the video earlier today for the VGM entry and thought it sounded different and listenable!
author: SupraDarky
